ing: 1/2 cup chocolate-hazelnut spread (such as NutellaÂ®), or more to taste
des: "These two simple ingredients make a beautifully rich and decadent treat. You can add shaved coconut for added flavor and texture. Enjoy!"
ins:
Beat coconut cream in a bowl with a whisk until creamy and smooth; add chocolate-hazelnut spread and stir until smooth. Pour the mixture into ice-pop molds.
Freeze mixture until solid, about 4 hours.
